price: a prepusti Meni one koji te u laž ugone, koji raskošno žive, i daj im malo vremena;
arabic: وَذَرۡنِي وَٱلۡمُكَذِّبِينَ أُوْلِي ٱلنَّعۡمَةِ وَمَهِّلۡهُمۡ قَلِيلًا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wadharnī wal-mukadhibīna ulī al-naʿmati wamahhil'hum qalīlan
